import React from 'react'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; import {connect} from 'react-redux'; import './header.styles.scss' import { ReactComponent as Logo } from '../../assets/logo.svg' import {auth} from '../../firebase/firebase.utils'; import CartIcon from '../cart-icon/cart-icon.component' import CartDropdown from '../cart-dropdown/cart-dropdown.component' const Header = ({currentUser}) => (
SHOP CONTACT { currentUser ?
auth.signOut()}>SIGN OUT
: SIGN IN }
) const mapStateToProps = state => ({ currentUser: state.user.currentUser }) export default connect(mapStateToProps) (Header);
